Get Expression Data for a Cluster

Source: R/mi_network.R
get_expr_data.Rd

Get Expression Data for a Cluster

Usage

get_expr_data(
  seurat_obj,
  cluster_id,
  cluster_field,
  assay_name = "RNA",
  counts_layer = "counts",
  data_layer = "data",
  top_n_genes = 5000,
  max_cells = 1500,
  min_expr_pct = 0.05
)

Arguments

seurat_obj

Seurat object

cluster_id

Cluster ID

cluster_field

Metadata column name for clusters

assay_name

Assay name (default: "RNA")

counts_layer

Layer for counts data (default: "counts")

data_layer

Layer for normalized data (default: "data")

top_n_genes

Number of top variable genes

max_cells

Maximum number of cells

min_expr_pct

Minimum expression percentage

Value

Expression matrix (genes x cells)
